meanings.definition: Not capable of being converted into coke.
meanings.sent1: The noncoking coal was not suitable for making coke.
meanings.sent2: The factory only used noncoking materials in their production process.
meanings.sent3: The noncoking coal decided it would rather stay as coal than turn into coke.
meanings.sent4: Her stubbornness was like that of noncoking coal, refusing to change its form.
meanings.sent5: The noncoking material stood firm, resisting any attempts to transform it into coke.

meanings.definition: Not involving the production of coke.
meanings.sent1: The noncoking process was more environmentally friendly.
meanings.sent2: The new technology promoted noncoking methods in steel production.
meanings.sent3: The noncoking approach saved the workers from the dirty task of coke production.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a noncoking way of solving problems, avoiding the usual methods.
meanings.sent5: The noncoking strategy proved to be both efficient and clean in the long run.
